title: Design Studio-Based Mathematics Instructional Design Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Instructional designer training program for mathematics education in smartphone-based LMS environments, emphasizing workplace application skills for working learners

learning_goals: Learners can develop more than three context-specific instructional design prototypes tailored to real-world mathematics education scenarios
Learners can improve educational materials by applying a design revision process involving more than two rounds of peer feedback
Learners can design effective learning experiences utilizing more than five types of mobile-friendly mathematics education tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
